sn2.20:1.1: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhagavato santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn2.20:6.2: Idaṃ vatvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
sn2.20:7.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn2.20:7.2: “imaṃ, bhikkhave, rattiṃ aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
sn2.20:7.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho, bhikkhave, so devaputto mama santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn2.20:12.2: Idaṃ vatvā maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
sn2.20:13.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn2.20:13.2: “so hi nūna, bhante, anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhavissati.
sn2.20:13.3: Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati āyasmante sāriputte abhippasanno ahosī”ti.
sn2.20:13.4: “Sādhu sādhu, ānanda, yāvatakaṃ kho, ānanda, takkāya pattabbaṃ anuppattaṃ taṃ tayā.
